sentences.en: After sixteen years of marriage they have grown bored with each other.
sentences.cn: 结婚16年后，他们已经渐渐彼此厌倦了。

sentences.en: At sixteen he could drink me under the table.
sentences.cn: 16岁的时候他就能把我灌醉了。

sentences.en: But it contained one very interesting piece of data: in 2008, for the first time in sixteen years, the finance and insurance industry shrank.
sentences.cn: 但是，这份报告里有一项非常耐人寻味的数据：在2008年，金融保险业出现近十六年来的首次萎缩。

sentences.en: By the age of sixteen he was the junior lightweight champion of Poland.
sentences.cn: 16岁时他已经是波兰的青少年组轻量级冠军。

sentences.en: He moved to London when he was sixteen (= 16 years old ) .
sentences.cn: 他 16 岁时搬到了伦敦。

sentences.en: He was scarcely sixteen when he joined the army.
I ran away from home when I was sixteen.
sentences.cn: 我16岁的时候离家出走了。

sentences.en: I've only lost sixteen pounds since I started this diet.
sentences.cn: 从这次节食开始到现在我只减了16磅。

sentences.en: In 1973, when he lived in Rome, his sixteen-year-old son was kidnapped.
sentences.cn: 1973年他在罗马居住时，他16岁的儿子遭到了绑架。

sentences.en: She began dating boys when she was sixteen.
sentences.cn: 她16岁时就开始同男孩子约会了.

sentences.en: She is sixteen but has a mental age of five.
sentences.cn: 她十六岁，而智力年龄是五岁。

sentences.en: She was sixteen and sweetly innocent.
sentences.cn: 她当时16岁,天真烂漫,招人喜爱.

sentences.en: Sixteen teams are taking part, divided into four groups.
Sixteen times as many men are colour-blind as women.
sentences.cn: 男性色盲为女性色盲的16倍。

sentences.en: The last time I saw her was about sixteen years ago.
sentences.cn: 我上次见她大约是16年前了。

sentences.en: We shall be landing in Paris in sixteen minutes, exactly on time.
sentences.cn: 我们将于16分钟后准时在巴黎降落。

words.tran_cn: 第十六的；十六分之一的
（与 the 连用）第六的，第六个的；六分之一的
月的第六日，（与the连用的）第六个；六分之一

trans.tran_cn: 十六，十六个，十六岁，十六点钟，十六的记号
